attributes.title: Sad

attributes.review: I tried to download it when Rome was burning and it just downloaded 😱😱😱 how could that happen it doesn’t make any sense but anyways after it downloaded a bunch of monsters with torches popped out from under my bed and then my mom started screaming and she was on fire and then I heard trump laughing evilly from all around and I was like omg my great president how could you allow this to happen and then he grew red horns and a tail and started shooting out fireballs and one hit my fish and it started morphing into Charlie damelio and she was making a tiktok so I ran up to her but everything disappeared and I was running off a cliff but Appa caught me and brought me back home thanks Appa but all of the sudden there were knocks at the door so I answered it and there were a bunch of slimey alien things and they kidnapped me and took me somewhere really really scary and they ate human hearts for breakfast and they kept offereing me some but I said no and then their faces morphed into Magats and I was so relieved to see some fellow ‘mericans 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🍻🍔🍕🍻🏈but then they had knifes and they were coming up all slow and scary and they were drooling and looking where my heart is and I screamed and they took my heart but I have a Horologium and it took over and then my dear Lupin saved me from the now terrible trumpers and we flew away on the Nautilus back to my wonderful loyal forever friends on Tiktok thanks every one. So end of story this app will ruin your life!!! Don’t download it’s awful!!  🤮😵☹️😰😣😞😱😭
attributes.title: NO AWFUL WARNING DONT DOWNLOAD ⚠️⚠️😭🤢
